name: iLumen
overview:
iLumen is the leader in customized business intelligence solutions - helping businesses turn financial and marketplace data into valuable, customized information, yielding actionable insights and better business decisions.

Their cloud-based business intelligence solutions are automated and scaleable, easy-to-use and secure, and can be tailored to meet the specific needs of a business

Their services are based on proprietary financial analysis, data and decision analytics, and business intelligence applications that deliver accurate and actionable customer intelligence.

Products include Industry Intelligence Solutions (for accounting and CPA firms), Supplier Intelligence Solutions (for banks and financial institutions) and Franchise intelligence Solutions (for franchise systems).
